column4: http://paste.ubuntu.com/207286/ anyone else getting this error?

Ah.  #ubuntu+1 for Karmic support.  That looks like some sort of packaging error
That's the correct channel for development version support, this channel is not appropriate for development support.
ya i know about that one.
Others? Adept is GUI for KDE, apt-get, aptitude
whats the diff between aptitude and dpkg?
dpkg does actual deb managing, apt provides the repository stuff.  apt uses dpkg to do the installations (apt meaning the library, which aptitude, adept, synaptic, apt-get, etc use)
ty so basically dpkg does the debian part and apt, aptitude does the normal ubuntu installs.
er, no.  apt gets the package files from the internet, dpkg installs them
apt-get feeds packages to dpkg, you cannot use apt-get without dpkg
Yes, if you download packages manually (like through wget, or whatever)
Ghoti: no, final is in the repos.
bazhang , why didnt you tell him to just got to the systems settings and change it there...
you forgot to tell him to hit send on paste and then get the url.
It's "Paste!" not send, and I did tell him
